text:
="preserve">William D. "Bill" Magee (June 21, 1939 – December 24, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the New York State Assembly, who represented the 121st Assembly District from 1991 until 2018. He was born in Oneida, New York. He was also a businessman.
Magee died on December 24, 2020 in Nelson, New York at the age of 81.
